info.title: Insightly
info.description: Insightly is the easiest customer relationship management solution (CRM) to use for managing deep customer relationships. Customers use Insightly's tightly integrated CRM & project management features to close new business, track post sale customer interactions & drive repeat purchases.

TASK_ID.description: The unique identifier of the task.

CATEGORY_ID.description: The unique identifier of the category.

COMPLETED.description: A boolean value determining whether or not the task is completed.

PROJECT_ID.description: The unique identifier of the project.

OPPORTUNITY_ID.description: The unique identifier of the opportunity.

MILESTONE_ID.description: The unique identifier of the milestone.

PIPELINE_ID.description: The unique identifier of the pipeline.

STAGE_ID.description: The unique identifier of the stage.

PERCENT_COMPLETE.description: The task completed value in percent.

OWNER_USER_ID.description: The unique identifier of the task owner.

RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID.description: The unique identifier of the user assigned to the task.

PUBLICLY_VISIBLE.description: A boolean value determining whether or not the task is publicly visible.

ASSIGNED_BY_USER_ID.description: The unique identifier of the assigned by user.

PARENT_TASK_ID.description: The unique identifier of the parent task.

OWNER_VISIBLE.description: A boolean value determining whether or not the owner is publicly visible.

ASSIGNED_TEAM_ID.description: The unique identifier of the assigned team.

REMINDER_SENT.description: A boolean value determining whether or not a reminder is set.

COMPLETED.description: A boolean value determining whether or not the task is completed.

PUBLICLY_VISIBLE.description: A boolean value determining whether or not the task is publicly visible.
